entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 23. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness this evening. 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 7:59 PM CDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 31 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 7:59 PM CDT Sunday 2 April 2023
